text: int main ( ) { int i , t , j , k , s [ 100 ] = { 0 } , a [ 100 ] , temp , sum = 0 , n ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { for ( i = 0 ; i < 101 ; i ++ ) s [ i ] = 0 ; sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] ) ; } for ( k = 0 ; k < j - 1 ; k ++ ) { if ( a [ k ] > a [ k + 1 ] ) { temp = a [ k ] ; a [ k ] = a [ k + 1 ] ; a [ k + 1 ] = temp ; } } s [ i ] = a [ k ] ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { sum += s [ i ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum - 1 ) ; } return 0 ; }
